Documents and what they say

History

TitlePage 1Page 2Page 3Page 4
3 Ancient DeitiesThe 3 famous gods,Fleria,Gadamon,and Bragma are worshipped by people across the land. Images are found in shrines everywhere.But there is a little-known fact about two of these gods: Gaderman and Phrelia.When these two were young, they bickered about everything, and caused people around them much trouble.
Ancient TechnologyLegend has it that in ancient times people used special methods to strengthen monsters.But the technology used was greatly harmful to the minds and bodies of the monsters - eventually causing them to go mad.This created a series of tragedies, until finally the technology itself was sealed away for good.
Cox's File 1A long time ago,the people in charge of monster training and regeneration were called Tochika.Fleria and Gadamon,who appear in the myths,were probably two of the Tochika. =P.J. Cox=
Cox's File 2Eventually, the Tochika shared their monster training skills with the general populationFor this they were revered by many people, and this likely explains why they were worshipped as deities in late generations. =P.J. Cox=
Cox's File 3There is a blank period of history in this world. It is the period between when the Tochicka spread their monster knowledge,and today's age. During this period, the technology for regenerating monsters from Saucer Stones, as well as the monster themselves,where lost. But nobody know why.=P.J. Cox=
Cox's File 4The Ruins of Promiass. Perhaps some secret lies here?The descendants of the Tochika live here. But it is not clear whether that is a mere coincidence,or holds some kind of significance. =P.J. Cox=
Cox's File 5Kawrea Volcano: This special location is believed to be the location whre the Phoenix dies and is reborn.Legend has it that long ago, the Phoenix fought an evil beast, saving the world. The Phoenix is a special type of monster.No matter who or what tries to stop the flutter of the Phoenix's wings,it will always continue flying. =P.J. Cox=
The Tochikan ShrineAccording to myth, the shrine used by the Tochika floated in the skies. A single, long road leading to the shrine extended down to the earth surface.Two theories exist about the fate of the shrine: One, that it lost its power to float in the skies, and fell to the earth.Two, that it still floats in the sky somewhere.One theory argues that the ruins in Sektova are the remains of the Tochikan Shrine, but this is unconfirmed.
Ancient StoneThe fragments of a stone laced with a mysterious power are scattered across the world.Legend has it that if the pieces are collected together, the lost power of the ancients will be revived. Many a soul has searched the world for these fragments.But, even those who collected the fragments failed to gain the power.Thus it is said: "The stone shall choose its owner, and only the chosen one shall gain its power.
Spark FluteThe fiery Lord of the Skies, whose eyes spark with wisdom, & whose wings contain the power of fire.Only the one who is pur of heart shall be blessed by the Lord's power.
Healing ChildThat land dweller, whose happiness was left for another age. The adorable one whose voice soothes all.Who brings the hearts of human and beast together in harmonyThe one who is human, but not human.


Monster

TitlePage 1Page 2Page 3Page 4 Page 5
Monster MysteriesThe regeneration of monsters is a recent phenomenon, but monsters themselves have existed from long ago.However, nobody knows why they were sealed in Saucer Stones, or when they dissapeared.
Ancient MonstersPeople say that the evolution of monsters in ancient times was different to that of monsters today. In the past, it is said that monsters exhibited variouspatterns of evolution depending on the characteristics of their local surroundings. This is a trait not found in monsters after that period.
[Origins]Monsters that appear the same sometimes take slightly different forms, depending on their area of origin.For example, take a Tsunomaru, a monster born from the combination of a Suezo and Tiger. Depending on where the Saucer Stone was found, and otherdifferences leading up to it's birth, the Tsunomaru may be born with or without horns.It is not known whether this is a factor determined by regional differences, or by a difference in the Saucer Stone itself.
About the DuckenThe Ducken is considered one of the most mysterious monsters of ancient civilization. Little is known about its creation.Ancient people, at one point, became unable to create the Ducken, and had to rely on regeneration from Saucer Stones.As a result, details about the Ducken, such as where, when, or why it was created are not known.Some theories say that is was merely a toy create by ancient peopleother theories argue that it was a doll that became imbued with a mystical power, like the Mew.
About the MocchiThe Mocchi are loved by all. It is no secret that Mocchi are enormously popular - there are few who can resist falling in love with these soft, adorable creatures.In ancient times, Mocchis were seen as pets. Many records show Mocchi living happily along side humans.
About the SuezoSince ancient times, people have had trouble raising the moody Suezo.There are tales of Suezo skipping training, or being put in charge of the shop, only to eat the items.Of course, most people are not silly enough to put Suezo in charge of a shop in the first place.
About the HengerThe henger is vivid evidence of the advanced technology of ancient civilization.It appears that numerous attempts were needed to create the henger. What is thought to be a Henger prototype was discovered in a Saucer Stone.It is thought that Hengers did not exist on Aeage Island, but they were discovered there recently, contradicting the former assumptions.This discovery suggests that Henger were used in areas all around the world in ancient times.
About the GolemThere are records of Golems going back to the age of myths. Humans have been familiar with the Golems for a long time.Even in the myths they are knowns as good-natured monsters, usually depicted as strong monsters with kind hearts.Sadly, due to their good nature, they usually only play sideline roles in the stories. Of course, I supposed that, too, is fitting of the Golem though.
About the PixieCute, but fickle. Lovable, but bratty. Perhaps this description reminds you of the trickiest of monsters, the Pixies.In every age, there have been breeders who were tricked by the mischievous Pixies.In some rare cases, with the most beautiful Pixies, wars were waged with them as the cause.We are unlikely to see any more such wars, but there have always been breeders raising pixies. And we will likely see more for generations eternal.




Land/Climate

TitlePage 1Page 2Page 3Page 4Page 5
The Elives SchoolA number of years back FIMBA and IMa worked in cooperation to create a breeder school called Elives School.The school attracted talented young boys and girls, who, after graduation, joined one of the two groups, FIMBA or IMa starting with official Breeder Rank E.
Vizley's MonsterVizley is known for its long monster lifespan. Currently, people are investigating whether this is because of the warm and comfortable climate,or a result of generating a monster in this town.
Regarding FIMBAFIMBA is the oldest existing organization. This group is dedicated to monster culture.Most of the famous breeders we know belong to FIMBA. But in recent years, IMa, through the use of Training Gadgets,has excelled in strenghtening monsters for monster battles. This has resulted in a monster strenght gap between this group and others.As a result, many young breeders prefer to join IMa over FIMBA.
Regarding AGIMAAGIMA is the most recently formed organization. Perhaps because of this, AGIMA is the most experimental of the groups.AGIMA makes the most use of the newest technologies.Furthermore, they are well known for having more advanced medical monster technology than other groups.
The Kalaragi MangoA fruit called the Kalaragi mango can be found in the Kalaragi Jungle. This fruit was loved and sought after by people in ancient times.There is a legend that the goddess Fleria ate a mango off the ground that made her sick, and for this reason she developed a distaste for them.
Modern JunglesThe two most well know jungles in the world are the Kalaragi and Pare-Pare jungles.Pare-Pare jungle, a resort area, is close to the sea. The exploration tours conducted there allow people to feel like real - life adventurers.In recent years, the discovery of numerous artifacts of an ancient culture in the Kalaragi Jungle has surprised academics.However, these investigations have been monopolized by FIMBA, creating stir among competing organizations.
The Lost PeachA fruit called the Golden Peach once grew in Pare-Pare, but in recent years, after the discovery of their usefulness for monster raising,Golden Peaches have become over-harvested. It was always a rare fruit, and now it is so much that few have set eyes upon one.Now, you can't get a Golden Peach even if you need one. They are found in the ruins beyond Rune, but now there are so many ill-mannered breeders there,no one can no longer visit the area for practice. Sometimes in Torble you can find it at the auction,but they fetch a pretty penny - the money needed to buy one Golden Peach could buy you 2 or 3 ranches.


Other

TitlePage 1Page 2Page 3Page 4Page 5
Training GadgetsUse of Training Gadgets has become popular in recent years, especially in Torble. Originally, they were devices used in ancient civilization,but with the successful decoding of ancient Training Gadget blueprints at Torble University, these devices have been recovered.With the help of Training Gadgets, it has become unnecessary to send monsters to far training grounds.But on the down side, some caution that the use of Training Gadgets in place of direct attention has led to a decrease in monsters' bond with their breeders.
Monster's LoveThere are ancient legends throughout the world referring to a forbidden bond between humans and monsters.Sadly, in most cases, however, no good came of this bond. The most common story tells of people being tricked by a Pixie out of their entire fortune.Breeders should always take care when dealing with such monsters.
A Dark CurseThe lost wisdom of yore! Get the mysterious object to master the fabled techniques!Why was it discarded? Why was it left behind? I bestow upon you the arts of yore. The black scroll will bring you happiness. Curse those who discarded it!
